posts.post_title: FS WTT: T212 Obaks Last 2 Lower Price
posts.post_content:

1910 T212 175 Sujects Hall SGC 40/3 $53 Shipped (clean back)


1911 T212 Coy SGC 40/3 $53 Shipped (light crease upper left corner)
